sentences.en: A blob of ink fell on the desk.
sentences.cn: 一滴墨水掉到了写字台上.

sentences.en: A blob of paint fell on the floor.
sentences.cn: 一滴油漆掉到了地板上.

sentences.en: An evolution machine generating a flamingo over a billion years from a bacterial blob is another.
sentences.cn: 进化机器经过十亿年由细菌液滴产生火烈鸟又是一例.

sentences.en: At first, we could only discern a blob.
sentences.cn: 一开始, 我们只能看到一团东西.

sentences.en: Embryonic stem cells clump together as a tiny and distinct blob inside fluid - filled balls called blastocysts.
sentences.cn: 胚胎干细胞在叫做胚泡、满流体的球中凝结成一团小而明显的斑点.

sentences.en: Fighting an amorphous blob of work will only cause procrastination.
sentences.cn: 穷于应付工作的细枝末节只会引起拖拉.

sentences.en: Finding blob in the input image using seed filling algorithm.
sentences.cn: 调查团在输入图像使用种子填充算法.

sentences.en: It's a blob and can be of any shape.
sentences.cn: 它们往往是粘乎乎黑糊糊的一团,可以是各种形状.

sentences.en: It's only necessary to use just a very small blob.
sentences.cn: 只需要很小的一滴就可以了。

sentences.en: The blob, says Dr Lintott, sees the galaxy as it was 40,000 years ago.
sentences.cn: Lintott博士说,如果我们站在这个斑点中的话, 我们看到的星系将是40000年前的样子.

sentences.en: This system detects the blob above the base plane by locating the borders.
sentences.cn: 该系统采用基于基值平面的思想,定位分界线来检测色谱峰.

sentences.en: Tip: This method is used to write image data ( BLOB ) from a database to a browser.
sentences.cn: 提示: 这个指令是用来把图片数据从数据库写入浏览器的.

sentences.en: We saves every blob and kilowatt - hour today in order to weight our customers in the market.
sentences.cn: 今天我们节省一滴水、一度电,明天客户就多一份立足、竞争的砝码.

sentences.en: Woggles come in three varieties: a blue blob, a red blob, a yellow blob.
sentences.cn: 小圆扣(woggle)有三种型号: 蓝色的小圆块, 红色的小圆块, 还有黄色的小圆块.

trans.tran_cn: 一滴，一抹，难以名状的一团
trans.tran_en: a very small round mass of a liquid or sticky substance
